title: Manoharam Moti Haaram: A Symphony of Pearls, Polkis, and Pink Carve Gemstones
materials: High-quality alloy base with micro-plated gold finish. Featuring lustrous freshwater pearls (Moti)
and delicately carved Pink Carve gemstones. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: A modern interpretation of the classic Haaram, this piece features an intricate floral design. Each pearl is carefully selected for its shine and size, creating a captivating cascade. The pink carve gemstones are placed to provide subtle texture to the piece. The filigree Polki diamond work adds a touch of traditional charm and brilliance.
colors: with soft hues of pink and accents of orange in the gemstones. This color palette is ideal for pairing with a range of traditional and contemporary outfits.
occasions: and other special occasions. It's also a unique piece for modern events where you want to make a statement with a touch of South Indian elegance.
description: This Haaram is a testament to our expert craftsmanship, blending traditional South Indian design principles with modern aesthetics. The carefully selected pearls and Polki diamonds make it a valuable and timeless piece. This show stopping peice brings South Indian cultural heritage with it.
